catalogue_raissonne: Skibbe 2003, Working List of Hodaka Yoshida Prints, #131
creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: vertically oriented print of overlapping geometric black and gray shapes; some black shapes are U-shaped, or square with cutout shapes, or circular; gray shapes are more organic and abstract, resembling facial features, fishing hooks, and other familiar objects
title: Totem Pole
